Primary Contact: Laura Stickle, Fire Trauma Counsellor; Phone: 778.214.3529 * 250.765.3450 ext 222; Fax: 250.765.3456; Email: lauras@kelsa.ca
Service Details: Kelowna and the greater Okanagan are highly affected by fires and natural disasters. If you have experienced trauma related to these at any time in the past, The Salvation Army would like to support you by providing counselling services. We are aware of the impact natural disasters can have on peoples lives and want to offer free support and work with you on an individual plan for healing and wellness.
Address & Map: The Salvation Army200 Rutland Rd SKelowna, BCCanada     V1X 2Z5
